hero_tagline: Find out what is planned on the Deanshanger Road site and how you can respond through the planning process.
hero_subcopy: Old Stratford Action Group is a local, non party political group of residents. We are here to explain the proposals in plain English and help people make their views known.
position_statement: Our position: we believe this is the wrong development in the wrong place at the wrong scale for Old Stratford.
